mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectMbrPntIntrlckHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ PNT_SN , MBR_NO , PNT_TP_CD , PNT_APL_RESN_CD , PNT_AMT , PNT_RESN_DSCR , ORD_NO , ORD_GOD_TURN , CLM_NO , CLM_WRHS_GOD_TURN , GOD_NO , GOD_EVL_TURN , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM MBR_PNT_INTRLCK_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND PNT_SN = #{pntSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.deleteMbrPntIntrlckHist Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ FROM MBR_PNT_INTRLCK_HIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND PNT_SN = #{pntSn,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
